author: veithen
msg: Adapted SAAJ to changes in Axiom.

author: veithen
msg: Added a "serialize" method that takes a "cache" parameter. Often, this is more convenient than having two methods "serialize" and "serializeAndConsume". It also allows to simplify some internal code.

author: gbrown
msg: Implement org.apache.pivot.collections.HashSet in terms of org.apache.pivot.collections.HashMap; add a basic unit test for HashSet.

author: ehatcher
msg: revert ASL in a CSV file.  that makes it unparsable and broke solr-rubys tests.  do we really need a license *in* _every_ file?
